summary: Reboot of sci servers expected this morning Thurs 7 Aug.

updates.details: Following a software upgrade on the SOF (QuoByte) storage, sci servers will each need to be rebooted to clear stuck processes. Please look out for console announcements.

Following a software upgrade on the SOF (QuoByte) storage, the globus transfer nodes also need rebooting this morning to clear stuck processes. This may cause some additional timeouts but should prevent the endpoint busy errors from happening in future. Normally transfer tasks should get retried automatically but this may result in some taking longer than usual.
